targets.compiledQuery:
SELECT timestamp, groupArray((Question, count)) FROM (SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(t), 1) * 1) * 1000  as timestamp, Question, sum(c) as count FROM DNS_DOMAIN_COUNT WHERE DnsDate >= toDate(1506625902) AND t >= toDateTime(1506625902) AND Server IN('default','valparaiso') group by t, Question ORDER BY count desc limit 5 by timestamp) GROUP BY timestamp
 ORDER BY timestamp
targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT timestamp, groupArray((Question, count)) FROM (SELECT $timeSeries as timestamp, Question, sum(c) as count FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter AND Server IN($ServerName) group by t, Question ORDER BY count desc limit 5 by timestamp) group by timestamp
order by timestamp

 ORDER BY timestamp
